resources.string:
TLDR

Mark the talks you want to see to crowd-avoid talk collisions in time.

Detail

A frontend to halfnarp inspired and using Tobi\'s Halfnarp Client Besides the client this app uses Butterknife and Otto from Square. Guava and the Android stuff from Google.

Code

You can find the code on GitHub - obey the GPL !-)

One more thing

Please consider not printing your 31C3 ticket but presenting it on some Android device via PassAndroid
